page.title: 11Sports and pastimes
page.content:
{Chalkwell Bowling Green On Friday I went to Chalkwell Bowling Green and met the Secretary.The club has been there since 1901.It is open all day in the summer.It is an open air club.zit is used for fun and some tournaments.There are 36 men and 40 women members.The grass is thick, very green and in good condition.This means you can only play in summer. {Windsurfing } Southend is ideal for windsurfing with its gently sloping seafront and warm climate. Every August nearly 200 competitors enter the windsurfing championships. You can hire winsurfing equipment and be taught. Information is available from the Tourist Office.
Written by Claire Maunder(8 yrs) and Neil Irvine (10 yrs)
